[Question] How did the AI solve the limitation of the Williamson ether synthesis reaction?
[Answer]
answer: The AI discovered a revolutionary synthesis route using a phosphorus-based catalyst, achieving an addition rate of over 99.5% and high molecular weight.
pred:
The AI used a combination of chemical synthesis robots, reaction vessels, and catalysts to overcome the limitation of the Williamson ether synthesis reaction. The AI also identified a number of challenges that needed to be addressed in order to scale up the production of Williamson ether.
